releases.name: Initial release
releases.body:
## Introducing Sense/Net Services 7.0.0 beta
Sense/Net Services is the base component of the [Sense/Net ECM platform](https://github.com/SenseNet/sensenet) that all other components will build on. 

### Installation
To get started, install the following NuGet package. Please follow the instructions in the [Getting started section](https://github.com/SenseNet/sensenet#GettingStarted) of the main readme.

[![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/v/SenseNet.Services.svg)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SenseNet.Services)

### Known issues
There are a couple of known issues with the beta release. We plan to solve these before releasing the stable version:

- Open in Office feature is [currently not available](/SenseNet/sensenet/issues/10) in the beta release.
- There is a single Services NuGet package that contains _both dlls and install content files_. If you install the package into _multiple projects_, all the install files (e.g. web.config additions) will be added to all those projects. In the future we will publish two different NuGet packages: one containing only dlls and one for install files.

releases.name: 2.0.0 Release Candidate 1
releases.body:
## Breaking changes
 - *SetSiteUrl* and *SetServiceToken* won't be available any longer. These settings can be specified during Repository instance instantiation
 - *OData Api methods* won't be available at the Global scope, you can use them through **Repository.Contents**

## New Fetatures
 - Introduced **Repository** class as the main, configurable entry point to the sense NET API
 - **JWT Token Authentication** implementation
 - Improved type safety for OData Operations

releases.name: 1.1.0-beta.1
releases.body:
### 1.1.0-beta.1 (2017-02-15)

#### Bug Fixes
- Change the portal url setting process and the related actions ([d0a4675d](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/d0a4675dea5d5ad4412e6f985ec6093ed30747ab))
- Siteurl related fixes ([3bb9327f](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/3bb9327f92fba22f09625aa51dd1639270f50c99))
- **common:** Login and logout methods are binded to the new actions in the odataapi module ([c259371b](hhttps://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/c259371b0566a1e3d8dc35d594d0518900befb98))

#### Features
- Add sn generated default ts files and their tests ([80e04abc](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/80e04abc96d1b7ff9e404cd96ac43a633b68f223))
- Add odata service token setting and login/logout actions ([b87e1f23](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/b87e1f2318552924fade39adcb806e7baa3e18ea))

releases.name: 1.0.2-beta.5
releases.body:
### 1.0.2-beta.5 (2016-12-05)

#### Bug Fixes
- ODataAPIActionObservables' name is changed to ODataApiActionObservables ([6b2a4cdc](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/6b2a4cdc))
- **actionobservables:** Change jquery ajax calls to fetch ([b7a2e490](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/b7a2e490))
- **import:** Add missing index.js file ([762dd7d1](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/762dd7d1))

#### Features
- **app:** Adding the sn-client-js library ([98a74a23](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/98a74a23))
- **location:** Related sn portal can be configured in a config file ([dc91f6cd](https://github.com/SenseNet/sn-client-js/commit/dc91f6cd))

releases.name: Initial release
releases.body:
## Introducing Sense/Net Client for .Net

A .Net client for Sense/Net ECM that makes it easy to use the REST API of the Content Repository.

### Binaries

If you want to reference this library in your project, please do it by installing the NuGet package.

[![NuGet](https://img.shields.io/nuget/v/SenseNet.Client.svg)](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SenseNet.Client)
